transcript.title: PRIME MINISTER TO MEET SMALL BUSINESS COALITION
transcript.content:
A4. A I,
A
PRIME MINISTER 11/ 92
PRIME MINISTER TO MEET SMALL BUSINESS COALITION
The Prime Minister has asked the Federal Minister for Small
Business, Construction and Customs, Mr David Beddall, to
convene a meeting with the Small Business Coalition.
The Coalition will meet with the Prime Minister and
Mr Beddall tomorrow ( Thursday 6 February) in 2R3 ( 2nd floor
Reps Committee Room 3) at
The Coalition is a representative body of more than 30 smal.
business organisations that meet at least twice a year with
Mr Beddall to discuss small business issues with the Federal.
Government. Tommorow's meeting is part of the Prime Minister's
consultation with business before he presents his Economic
Statement on 26 February.
Attached is a list of members of the Small Business
Coalition that will attend the meeting.
CANBERRA FEBRUARY 19192
Details of picfac opportunities will be posted tomorrow
( Thursday)
